name: Virtual Family Pregnant Mom 3D
description:
Virtual Family Pregnant Mom 3D lets you perform tough household activities including clearing kids mess in-house rooms with baby care or visiting the supermarket for purchasing house grocery utilizing mommy simulator.

Prepare yourself for highly engaging Virtual Family Pregnant Mom 3D providing you as virtual pregnant mom has to comfort her virtual family while performing numerous household activities. Feed your kids, clean the house, make your kids ready for school. Visit supermarket for house groceries in this family fun game, allows you to get engaged in the virtual world as busy mommy comforting her baby with mommy care.

Salient Features:

- Beautiful designed colorful HD graphics with engaging virtual family animations.
- Top notch sounds & realistic housewife effects from the virtual family game.
- Beautifully designed highly engaging levels of family fun games.
- Highly engaging virtual games based play mode.
